name: prometheus-2.0.12
body:
## What's Changed
* Bump codacy/codacy-analysis-cli-action from 3.0.3 to 4.0.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/jenkinsci/prometheus-plugin/pull/285
* Bump slf4j.version from 1.7.31 to 1.7.32 by @dependabot in https://github.com/jenkinsci/prometheus-plugin/pull/286
* Bump jackson2-api from 2.12.3 to 2.12.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/jenkinsci/prometheus-plugin/pull/287
* Bump plugin from 4.19 to 4.21 by @dependabot in https://github.com/jenkinsci/prometheus-plugin/pull/288
* Bump plugin from 4.21 to 4.24 by @dependabot in https://github.com/jenkinsci/prometheus-plugin/pull/290
* Bump script-security from 1.77 to 1.78 by @dependabot in https://github.com/jenkinsci/prometheus-plugin/pull/291
* Fixes #279: Jenkins job duration metrics filterable by buildable status by @juanpablo-santos in https://github.com/jenkinsci/prometheus-plugin/pull/294
* Bump junit from 1.51 to 1.52 by @dependabot in https://github.com/jenkinsci/prometheus-plugin/pull/295
* Bump workflow-step-api from 2.23 to 2.24 by @dependabot in https://github.com/jenkinsci/prometheus-plugin/pull/282
* Bump actions/stale from 3 to 4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/jenkinsci/prometheus-plugin/pull/283
* Bump gson from 2.8.7 to 2.8.8 by @dependabot in https://github.com/jenkinsci/prometheus-plugin/pull/296
* Don't export disk usage metrics of orphaned items by @twz123 in https://github.com/jenkinsci/prometheus-plugin/pull/298
* Bump prometheus.simpleClientJava.version from 0.11.0 to 0.12.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/jenkinsci/prometheus-plugin/pull/299
* Add metrics about file store usage by @twz123 in https://github.com/jenkinsci/prometheus-plugin/pull/300
* Bump junit from 1.52 to 1.53 by @dependabot in https://github.com/jenkinsci/prometheus-plugin/pull/303
* Bump plugin from 4.24 to 4.25 by @dependabot in https://github.com/jenkinsci/prometheus-plugin/pull/304
* Bump plugin from 4.25 to 4.27 by @dependabot in https://github.com/jenkinsci/prometheus-plugin/pull/306
* Bump jackson2-api from 2.12.4 to 2.12.4-1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/jenkinsci/prometheus-plugin/pull/308
* Bump plugin from 4.27 to 4.28 by @dependabot in https://github.com/jenkinsci/prometheus-plugin/pull/310
* Bump workflow-job from 2.41 to 2.42 by @dependabot in https://github.com/jenkinsci/prometheus-plugin/pull/311

* Bump gson from 2.8.8 to 2.8.9 by @dependabot in https://github.com/jenkinsci/prometheus-plugin/pull/316

* Bump plugin from 4.30 to 4.31 by @dependabot in https://github.com/jenkinsci/prometheus-plugin/pull/320
* Bump structs from 1.23 to 1.24 by @dependabot in https://github.com/jenkinsci/prometheus-plugin/pull/321
* Bump pipeline-graph-analysis from 1.11 to 1.12 by @dependabot in https://github.com/jenkinsci/prometheus-plugin/pull/322

* Bump pipeline-rest-api from 2.20 to 2.21 by @dependabot in https://github.com/jenkinsci/prometheus-plugin/pull/351
* Bump prometheus.simpleClientJava.version from 0.14.1 to 0.15.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/jenkinsci/prometheus-plugin/pull/353
* Bump junit from 1.53 to 1.55 by @dependabot in https://github.com/jenkinsci/prometheus-plugin/pull/354
* Bump slf4j.version from 1.7.35 to 1.7.36 by @dependabot in https://github.com/jenkinsci/prometheus-plugin/pull/355
* Bump plugin from 4.33 to 4.34 by @dependabot in https://github.com/jenkinsci/prometheus-plugin/pull/356
* Bump gson from 2.8.9 to 2.9.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/jenkinsci/prometheus-plugin/pull/357
* Bump workflow-api from 1136.v7f5f1759dc16 to 1138.v619fd5201b_2f by @dependabot in https://github.com/jenkinsci/prometheus-plugin/pull/361
* Bump plugin from 4.34 to 4.35 by @dependabot in https://github.com/jenkinsci/prometheus-plugin/pull/360
* Bump metrics from 4.0.2.8.1 to 4.1.6.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/jenkinsci/prometheus-plugin/pull/359
* Disable DiskUsageCollector when its option is unchecked (JENKINS-66790) by @agabrys in https://github.com/jenkinsci/prometheus-plugin/pull/337
* Revert "Disable DiskUsageCollector when its option is unchecked (JENKINS-66790)" by @markyjackson-taulia in https://github.com/jenkinsci/prometheus-plugin/pull/363
* Use Mockito Inline instead of PowerMock and cleanup dependencies by @agabrys in https://github.com/jenkinsci/prometheus-plugin/pull/365
* Disable DiskUsageCollector when its option is unchecked (JENKINS-66790) by @agabrys in https://github.com/jenkinsci/prometheus-plugin/pull/364
* Move away from deprecated Release Drafter App by @NotMyFault in https://github.com/jenkinsci/prometheus-plugin/pull/371
* Update PrometheusConfiguration.java by @chenlong220192 in https://github.com/jenkinsci/prometheus-plugin/pull/372
* Bump codacy/codacy-analysis-cli-action from 4.0.0 to 4.0.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/jenkinsci/prometheus-plugin/pull/374
* Bump bom-2.319.x from 1155.v77b_fd92a_26fc to 1198.v387c834fca_1a_ by @dependabot in https://github.com/jenkinsci/prometheus-plugin/pull/373
* Bump plugin from 4.37 to 4.38 by @dependabot in https://github.com/jenkinsci/prometheus-plugin/pull/376
* Bump bom-2.319.x from 1198.v387c834fca_1a_ to 1210.vcd41f6657f03 by @dependabot in https://github.com/jenkinsci/prometheus-plugin/pull/377

* Bump bom-2.319.x from 1210.vcd41f6657f03 to 1246.va_b_50630c1d19 by @dependabot in https://github.com/jenkinsci/prometheus-plugin/pull/381
* Possible fix for #375 by @Waschndolos in https://github.com/jenkinsci/prometheus-plugin/pull/384
* Bump bom-2.319.x from 1246.va_b_50630c1d19 to 1289.v5c4b_1c43511b_ by @dependabot in https://github.com/jenkinsci/prometheus-plugin/pull/387
* Replace git.io with expanded URLs by @MarkEWaite in https://github.com/jenkinsci/prometheus-plugin/pull/390
* Bump github/codeql-action from 1 to 2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/jenkinsci/prometheus-plugin/pull/391
* Bump bom-2.319.x from 1289.v5c4b_1c43511b_ to 1342.v729ca_3818e88 by @dependabot in https://github.com/jenkinsci/prometheus-plugin/pull/392
* Added Prometheus Info-Object by @o4rz3l in https://github.com/jenkinsci/prometheus-plugin/pull/393
* Bump bom-2.319.x from 1342.v729ca_3818e88 to 1362.v59f2f3db_80ee by @dependabot in https://github.com/jenkinsci/prometheus-plugin/pull/394
* Bump bom-2.319.x from 1362.v59f2f3db_80ee to 1382.v7d694476f340 by @dependabot in https://github.com/jenkinsci/prometheus-plugin/pull/396
* Fix duplicate TYPE lines for jenkins_node_builds metric by @MarkRx in https://github.com/jenkinsci/prometheus-plugin/pull/397

## New Contributors
* @juanpablo-santos made their first contribution in https://github.com/jenkinsci/prometheus-plugin/pull/294
* @twz123 made their first contribution in https://github.com/jenkinsci/prometheus-plugin/pull/298
* @agabrys made their first contribution in https://github.com/jenkinsci/prometheus-plugin/pull/337
* @NotMyFault made their first contribution in https://github.com/jenkinsci/prometheus-plugin/pull/371
* @chenlong220192 made their first contribution in https://github.com/jenkinsci/prometheus-plugin/pull/372
* @Waschndolos made their first contribution in https://github.com/jenkinsci/prometheus-plugin/pull/384
* @MarkEWaite made their first contribution in https://github.com/jenkinsci/prometheus-plugin/pull/390
* @o4rz3l made their first contribution in https://github.com/jenkinsci/prometheus-plugin/pull/393
* @MarkRx made their first contribution in https://github.com/jenkinsci/prometheus-plugin/pull/397

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jenkinsci/prometheus-plugin/compare/2.0.11...prometheus-2.0.12

<!-- Optional: add a release summary here -->
* Make cloudbees-disk-usage-simple optional dep (#248) @msven
* Build parameter as separate metric label (#240) @mashinarius
* ENV Variable for collecting diskusage (#241) @bashbers
* adding new dependancy (#232) @markyjackson-taulia
* Fix excessive metrics (#230) @msven
* chore(ci): add dependabot config (#211) @h1dden-da3m0n
* ISSUE-204 - last build metrics don't have stages breakdown (#205) @ShimiTaNaka
* Issue 185 - Names & Labels for jenkins_node_*_builds Metrics (#193) @james-m-tubbs
* Fix null pointer exception when gathering job parameters ([JENKINS-63998](https://issues.jenkins.io/browse/JENKINS-63998) - ) (#192) @motlib
* Add executor load statistics collector (#168) @msabastian
* change log level to debug (#184) @yimgzz
* SNAPSHOT (#181) @markyjackson-taulia
* Replace System Rules with System Lambda (#165) @stefanbirkner
* Fix successful stage detection (#178) @sll552
* Add metrics for individual runs, fix stage detection (#177) @sll552
* Make prometheus plugin open for contributions from other plugins (#175) @MindaugasLaganeckas
* Update pom URL [WEBSITE-406](https://issues.jenkins.io/browse/WEBSITE-406) - (#173) @KasperFranz

## 📦 Dependency updates

* Bump plugin from 4.17 to 4.18 (#242) @dependabot
* Bump jackson2-api from 2.12.1 to 2.12.2 (#243) @dependabot
* Bump workflow-api from 2.41 to 2.42 (#234) @dependabot
* Bump jackson2-api from 2.10.2 to 2.12.1 (#235) @dependabot
* Bump metrics from 4.0.2.6 to 4.0.2.7 (#229) @dependabot
* Bump workflow-job from 2.36 to 2.40 (#228) @dependabot
* Bump plugin from 3.56 to 4.17 (#227) @dependabot
* Bump structs from 1.20 to 1.22 (#226) @dependabot
* Bump workflow-step-api from 2.22 to 2.23 (#222) @dependabot
* Bump slf4j.version from 1.7.26 to 1.7.30 (#218) @dependabot
* Bump script-security from 1.56 to 1.76 (#220) @dependabot
* Bump httpcore from 4.4.13 to 4.4.14 (#217) @dependabot
* Bump workflow-api from 2.38 to 2.41 (#215) @dependabot
* Bump cloudbees-disk-usage-simple from 0.9 to 0.10 (#214) @dependabot
* Bump workflow-support from 3.3 to 3.8 (#213) @dependabot
* Bump codacy/codacy-analysis-cli-action from 1.1.0 to 2.0.1 (#212) @dependabot
